local_intent: Confirm grasp_pose available, repeatedly approach and align to it with tight tolerance, then verify arrival at the grasp pose.
assumptions: grasp_pose was computed earlier by ComputeGraspPose
Target pose is reachable without collision
coherence_with_global: Matches MainTree phase where ApproachAndAlign(target=grasp_pose, tolerance=0.01, timeout_ms=1200) runs after ComputeGraspPose and before Pick; adds retry to handle misalignment and verifies position.
